GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V APPROACHED BY PIRATES IN 05-44.8N 004-47.5E
   AT 190716Z AUG. VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP
   CLEAR OF THIS POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME
   CAUTION. REPORTS TO MDAT-GOG, PHONE: 332 9822 8888,
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 260831Z AUG 17.
